address.deliveryPoint: Dipartimento di Biologia, Università di Pisa, via Derna 1, I-56126 Pisa, Italy

abstract.para: The databases stores historical and current plant occurrence records relative to Sicily administrative region of Italy (NUTS-2 code ITG1). Source of records may be bibliographical references, herbarium specimens, or human observations. The database is associated with the Wikiplantbase project, including sister databases for Sardinia, Liguria and Tuscany

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial (CC-BY-NC) 4.0 License.

address.deliveryPoint: Department of agricultural, food and forest Sciences, University of Palermo, via Archirafi, 38, I-90123 - Palermo, Italy
